statements: DELETE FROM MatchResults WHERE losing_team = 'Team A' AND losing_score < winning_score;
DELETE FROM MatchResults WHERE losing_team = 'Team A' AND losing_score < 3;
DELETE FROM MatchResults WHERE winning_score > 5 AND game_duration > INTERVAL '1 day';
DELETE FROM teams WHERE team_name = 'Team A';
DELETE FROM match_results WHERE losing_team_id = 3 AND game_duration > '01:30:00';
DELETE FROM teams WHERE team_name = 'Manchester United' AND team_location = 'England';
DELETE FROM LosingTeams WHERE team_name = 'Team B';
